text:
@HillaryClinton @Sophie_Mokoena It's prudent to close schools till end of COVID19 peak. Pupils/students may be less prone to virus but will worsen situations by spreading to their families.
Again,our teachers are in great risk.Losing our teachers,that's  great loss indeed!
